info.title: HealthDesk Plus API
info.description: Comprehensive healthcare management system for doctors, patients, appointments, prescriptions, and medical records.

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of all appointments for the authenticated doctor

post.description: Register a new doctor with practice information
Authenticate user and return access token

get.description: Get the authenticated user's profile information
Retrieve comprehensive statistics for the doctor's dashboard including patient counts, appointment metrics, and practice analytics
Retrieve a paginated list of all patients for the authenticated doctor's practice

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term for patient name or ID

post.description: Add a new patient to the practice

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific patient

delete.description: Soft delete a patient (mark as inactive)

instructions.example: Rest and drink plenty of fluids
